service_name: Desktop as a Service (OFFICIAL-SENSITIVE) DaaS, hosted virtual desktop
page_content:
Equiniti ICS Ltd.

Desktop as a Service (OFFICIAL-SENSITIVE) DaaS, hosted virtual desktop

Desktop as a service from Equiniti provides a hosted virtual desktop environment as a cloud service based on Citrix. Equiniti’s virtual desktop solution, desktop as a service transforms desktops and applications into a secure on-demand service. Equiniti’s solution delivers individual Windows, web and SaaS applications, or full virtual desktops.

Features

  • Improve application management
  • Reduce complexity and lower the cost of desktop management
  • Controlling and encrypting access to data and applications
  • Delivering DaaS applications instantly to users anywhere on any device
  • Automating the process of delivering or updating applications
  • Enabling IT to focus on strategic initiatives

Benefits

  • Enables Windows applications to be virtual desktop
  • Delivering desktop as a service to users anywhere.
  • Empowers users with on-demand self-service applications
  • Used by more than 100 million people worldwide
  • Instantly delivered to users anywhere on any device

Pricing

£600 per unit per month

  • Excluding VAT
  • Termination costs apply
  • Minimum contract period: Month
